name: listClientServers
shortDescription: Returns information about all RPC servers registered with Homegear by clients
description: This method returns an array of type ServerInfo with one entry for each RPC server registered with Homegear and does so by calling init.

parameters.name: interfaceId
parameters.description: This is the interface ID of the RPC server as it was passed to init. If it is specified, only the ServerInfo for this server is returned.

returnValue: Returns an array of type ServerInfo

errors.description: An interface ID was passed as an argument, but the server was not found.
